CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1978 Code, as updated through May 13, 1997, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1978 Code, as supplemented. Ordinances adopted since May 13, 1997, and not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance
Number  Date Section  Section
this Code
